long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that helps you navigate the abyss of Wallet addresses on the native Block explorers of your favourite blockchains like Polygoscan, etc . No need to remember the puzzling 14 digit alpha numerics anymore rather assign a custom name to it which will reflected in the webpage.
